source-layers.sql: SELECT the_geom_webmercator, jurisdicti FROM dcm WHERE feat_type = 'Bulkhead_line'
SELECT the_geom_webmercator, jurisdicti FROM dcm WHERE feat_type = 'Pierhead_line'
SELECT the_geom_webmercator, ST_Area(the_geom) as area, cartodb_id AS id, altmappdf, extract(epoch from effect_dt) as effective, status FROM dcm_citymapalterations ORDER BY area DESC
SELECT the_geom_webmercator, street_nm AS streetname, COALESCE('   (' || streetwidt || ' ft)') AS streetwidth, roadwaytyp, feat_statu FROM dcm_streetcenterline

SELECT the_geom_webmercator, (CASE WHEN record_st = 'Yes' THEN 'Record_St' ELSE feat_type END) as feat_type, record_st, borough FROM dcm WHERE feat_type NOT IN ('Pierhead_line', 'Bulkhead_line', 'Rail')
SELECT the_geom_webmercator, intro_num, intro_year, lleffectdt, CASE WHEN honor_name = 'none' THEN officialnm ELSE honor_name END FROM dcm_streetnamechanges_points
SELECT the_geom_webmercator, intro_num, intro_year, lleffectdt, CASE WHEN honor_name = 'none' THEN officialnm ELSE honor_name END FROM dcm_streetnamechanges_lines
SELECT the_geom_webmercator, intro_num, intro_year, lleffectdt, CASE WHEN honor_name = 'none' THEN officialnm ELSE honor_name END FROM dcm_streetnamechanges_areas
SELECT the_geom_webmercator, '' AS street FROM dcm WHERE feat_type = 'Rail'
